welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Marshall, the charming small town known for its rich history and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our town has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Harrison County Airport offers services for both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Harrison County Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and their guests.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kilgore Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kilgore Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shreveport Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Shreveport Regional Airport handles all air freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
